input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Liking spicy food has a direct effect on the forest. The smoker has a direct effect on the forest. We know that liking spicy food and the chain-smoker lighting a match causes the forest on fire. We observed the chain-smoker doesn't light a match. Would the forest burns down if not liking spicy food instead of liking spicy food?
